condoning.question: Did I fail to speak up when another's child was being led astray, rather than address the uncomfortable situation?

condoning.question: Did I permit my grandchild to be exposed to bad influences?
condoning.description: Parents have to protect their children's well-being, guarding them from harmful elements that could damage their faith or lead them into sin.

condoning.question: Have I given approval, through my words, to another Catholic to marry outside the Church?

scandal.description: For Catholics, marriage is sacramental and needs to occur in the Church or receive a dispensation if either people are not Catholic.

scandal.question: Did I try to lead someone else into sinful behavior through my actions?

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' blessings, such as their possessions, successes, or good fortune, would somehow be diminished or taken away from them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking to others using language that was coarse , impolite , or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking to others using language that was coarse, impolite, or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in expressing yourself to others through words that were unseemly or coarse
through words that were unseemly or coarse
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in expressing yourself to others through words that were unseemly or coarse?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to earthly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: for eating or drinking in excess
gluttony.question: Did I use my bodily resources for eating or drinking in excess, to an imprudent degree?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained others by sharing their private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you engage in work on Sunday that could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did you engage in unnecessary activity on Sunday, failing to honor its significance as a day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
